game.name: Super Meat Boy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 악명높은 무자비한 플랫포머 게임이 플레이 가능한 헤드크랩 캐릭터(스팀 특전)와 함께 스팀에 왔습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The infamous, tough-as-nails platformer comes to Steam with a playable Head Crab character (Steam-exclusive)!

reviewHighlights.text: This game gets a [b]6/10[/b] from me. I really wish Steam had a [i]neutral review[/i] option. And to be clear: I’m not reviewing the casual playthroug...
this game is a freakin masterpiece,truly one of the best platformer ever made
